Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • MovingImage
            • Enemy
              • Boss
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Boss
extends Enemy
    The Boss class represents the final enemy which the Hero can defeat with all of the same abilities as the Hero.
    Version:
    5.23.21
    Author:
    animan_patil
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Boss

        public Boss(processing.core.PImage img,
            int x,
            int y)
        Creates a new instance of a Boss object having its left corner at the inputed (x, y) coordinates.
        Parameters:
        img - The PImage which the Boss will look like in the game (sprite).
        x - The X value of the Boss' top left corner.
        y - The Y value of the Boss' top left corner.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(Hero hero)
        Makes the Boss act by shooting fireballs, dashing, and making a water wave to deal damage to hero. Flips screen if below half health.
        Parameters:
        hero - The player
